Create a dog leash that doubles as a portable water bowl for dogs on-the-go.
Design a dog leash that has built-in sensors to detect potential dangers, such as potholes or loose rocks, and alert the owner with an LED light or sound.
Integrate a smartphone app into the dog leash that allows owners to track their pet's location, set virtual boundaries, and receive alerts if their dog wanders too far away.
Develop a dog leash that converts into a portable bed for dogs when they're tired from walking or playing.
Create a dog leash that uses eco-friendly materials and is designed to biodegrade after use.
